title: Full B2B Service Package
paragraphs: The B2B Full Service package is GTS’s most robust package for employers. We provide end-to-end support in the recruitment process from the time an employer creates a job description to the point in which they’ve hired a successful candidate.

The employer is supported in standardizing their job descriptions on a global scale, verifying candidate credentials, evaluating candidates and understanding their fit for the role, identifying candidate competency gaps & how to close them, and developing a roadmap to close candidate gaps.

highlights.title: Identifying best Employer-Candidate match:
highlights.description: Our solutions focus on identifying top talent that aligns with client needs and company culture.

samples.title: Meet Sarah, HR Director at a growing tech startup

headlineItems.value: Sarah, HR Director at a growing tech startup

paragraphs.title: Business Needs
paragraphs.paragraph: Sarah is responsible for overseeing the entire recruitment process and wants to scale talent acquisition in a structured way as the company expands. Her company often hires international candidates but lacks the global expertise needed to ensure proper credential verification and fit for specific roles.

paragraphs.title: Pain Points
paragraphs.paragraph: Difficulty in evaluating international candidates, ensuring compliance with global hiring standards, and ensuring new hires are competent and fit for the role.

paragraphs.title: Goals
paragraphs.paragraph: To streamline and professionalize the recruitment process, ensure all hires are well-qualified, and reduce hiring mistakes that cost time and resources.

paragraphs.title: Package Fit
paragraphs.paragraph: The B2B Full Service Package provides Sarah with end-to-end recruitment support, from standardized job descriptions to credential verification and gap analysis. She values having a structured, expert-driven process to ensure hires are ready for success and meet the company’s growth needs.

title: Technology-enabled Recruitment Facilitation
paragraphs: Employers can access our vast global candidate database, standardize job descriptions, and verify candidate credentials. They handle candidate evaluation and gap identification.

highlights.title: For employers:
highlights.description: We provide our employers access to that database and support them in standardizing their job descriptions for global recruitment as well as verifying credentials of candidates they’ve found through out platform. Employers are responsible for evaluating candidates themselves, identifying any gaps they don’t meet, and developing a roadmap to close those gaps.

highlights.title: For job-seekers:
highlights.description: We provide global candidates with the ability to create a candidate profile and be included in our global candidate database and ensure that their credentials, education, and professional background is translated by GTS’s Smart Match Algorithm into best-fit-for-Canada profile.

samples.title: Meet John, Talent Acquisition Manager at a small manufacturing company.

headlineItems.value: John, Talent Acquisition Manager at a small manufacturing company

paragraphs.title: Business Needs
paragraphs.paragraph: John’s company is growing, and they need to hire more skilled workers, but they have limited in-house recruitment resources. John is open to international hires but doesn't have the expertise to evaluate them properly.

paragraphs.title: Pain Points
paragraphs.paragraph: Overwhelmed by the recruitment process, not enough resources to vet international candidates, difficulty writing job descriptions that appeal globally.

paragraphs.title: Goals
paragraphs.paragraph: To find qualified global candidates without going over budget, ensure that the hiring process is more efficient, and create standardized job descriptions that work for international recruitment.

paragraphs.title: Package Fit
paragraphs.paragraph: Package 2: Technology-enabled Recruitment Facilitation offers John a simple solution—access to a global database of candidates, terminology translation, and credential verification. It allows him to streamline the hiring process without requiring extensive in-house recruitment expertise. He will be responsible for evaluating candidates, but the tools provided will help him navigate the global hiring landscape more effectively.

paragraphs.title: Background
paragraphs.paragraph: Maria is an experienced IT professional seeking work in Canada. She has the skills but lacks the local certifications that Canadian employers typically prefer.

paragraphs.title: Pain Points
paragraphs.paragraph: Uncertainty about the Canadian job market, limited access to resources to adapt her skills to Canadian standards.

paragraphs.title: Goals
paragraphs.paragraph: To find a rewarding job in Canada, upskill if necessary, and connect with employers who are open to hiring international talent.

paragraphs.title: Package Fit
paragraphs.paragraph: As part of the Package 2: Technology-enabled Recruitment Facilitation, Maria benefits from joining the global candidate database, where she can showcase her skills and be matched with employers. Terminology translation and credential verification will enhance her employability, helping her secure a position more easily.
